## Protocol.DOMSnapshot.DOMNode interface

A Node in the DOM tree.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DOMNode 
```

|  [contentLanguage](./puppeteer.protocol.domsnapshot.domnode.contentlanguage.md) | string | Only set for documents, contains the document's content language. |

|  [documentEncoding](./puppeteer.protocol.domsnapshot.domnode.documentencoding.md) | string | Only set for documents, contains the document's character set encoding. |

|  [frameId](./puppeteer.protocol.domsnapshot.domnode.frameid.md) | [Page.FrameId](./puppeteer.protocol.page.frameid.md) | Frame ID for frame owner elements and also for the document node. |
|  [inputChecked](./puppeteer.protocol.domsnapshot.domnode.inputchecked.md) | boolean | Only set for radio and checkbox input elements, indicates if the element has been checked |
|  [inputValue](./puppeteer.protocol.domsnapshot.domnode.inputvalue.md) | string | Only set for input elements, contains the input's associated text value. |
|  [isClickable](./puppeteer.protocol.domsnapshot.domnode.isclickable.md) | boolean | Whether this DOM node responds to mouse clicks. This includes nodes that have had click event listeners attached via JavaScript as well as anchor tags that naturally navigate when clicked. |
|  [layoutNodeIndex](./puppeteer.protocol.domsnapshot.domnode.layoutnodeindex.md) | [integer](./puppeteer.protocol.integer.md) | The index of the node's related layout tree node in the <code>layoutTreeNodes</code> array returned by <code>getSnapshot</code>, if any. |

|  [nodeValue](./puppeteer.protocol.domsnapshot.domnode.nodevalue.md) | string | <code>Node</code>'s nodeValue. |
|  [optionSelected](./puppeteer.protocol.domsnapshot.domnode.optionselected.md) | boolean | Only set for option elements, indicates if the element has been selected |
|  [originURL](./puppeteer.protocol.domsnapshot.domnode.originurl.md) | string | The url of the script (if any) that generates this node. |

|  [publicId](./puppeteer.protocol.domsnapshot.domnode.publicid.md) | string | <code>DocumentType</code> node's publicId. |
|  [scrollOffsetX](./puppeteer.protocol.domsnapshot.domnode.scrolloffsetx.md) | number | Scroll offsets, set when this node is a Document. |

|  [textValue](./puppeteer.protocol.domsnapshot.domnode.textvalue.md) | string | Only set for textarea elements, contains the text value. |
